body:
To add to Terry's observations.

If you prefer a single-platform/single-OS solution, then SketchUp ->
Radiance on the Mac works very well.  Export 3DS and convert to
Radiance as described by Terry (or use the 3ds2rad script which
you'll find on these pages somewhere).

-John

subject: [Radiance-general] Re: monitor model upload in Desktop Radiance
